jdbm.recman
Class FreePhysicalRowIdPageManager

java.lang.Object
  jdbm.recman.FreePhysicalRowIdPageManager

final class FreePhysicalRowIdPageManager
extends java.lang.Object

This class manages free physical rowid pages and provides methods to free and allocate physical rowids on a high level.

Method Detail

get

long get(int size)
   throws java.io.IOException
Returns a free physical rowid of the indicated size, or null if nothing was found. This scans the free physical row table, which is modeled as a linked list of pages. Each page on that list has slots that are either free (awaiting the insertion of the location of a free physical row) or available for reallocation requests. An allocated slot is indicated by a non-zero size field in that slot and the size is the size of the available free record in bytes.

Throws:
java.io.IOException

put

void put(long rowid,
         int size)
   throws java.io.IOException
Puts the indicated rowid on the free list

Throws:
java.io.IOException
